question: What is the name of the US-based private equity firm, which is to acquire a 1.15% stake in Jio Platforms, by investing Rs 5,655.75 crore?
explanation:
US private equity firm Silver Lake recently announced that it would invest Rs 5,655.75 crore in Jio Platforms for a 1.15% stake.
This represents a 12.5% premium investment, and will be made at an equity value of Rs 4.90 lakh crore. Jio Platforms is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Reliance Industries Limited. Last week Technology major Facebook announced that it will acquire 9.9% stake in Jio Platforms for Rs 43,574 crore.
